attributes.action: Rollback or reduce the exorbitant hike in IHS and visa fees
attributes.additional_details:
The hike of 65% in IHS fees along with a hike of 15-20% in visa fees makes most sponsored jobs except the very high paying ones economically unsustainable.

For a family of four settling in the UK after 5 years, the total visa fees and IHS would amount to approximately £33,000. This exorbitant sum places an extreme strain on families who are seeking to contribute positively to the UK society and economy.
attributes.background: Please rollback or reduce the quantum of the exorbitant hike in the Health Surcharge (IHS) for skilled worker visas and students. The increase, from £624 to £1035 per year for workers and from £470 to £776 per year for students, places an overwhelming financial burden on individuals & families

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641140
